# thsum_model

This model is a fine-tuned version of [thanathorn/mt5-cpe-kmutt-thai-sentence-sum](https://huggingface.co/thanathorn/mt5-cpe-kmutt-thai-sentence-sum) on an unknown dataset.
It achieves the following results on the evaluation set:
- eval_loss: 2.3515
- eval_rouge1: 0.078
- eval_rouge2: 0.0161
- eval_rougeL: 0.0782
- eval_rougeLsum: 0.0776
- eval_gen_len: 18.96
- eval_runtime: 231.707
- eval_samples_per_second: 4.316
- eval_steps_per_second: 2.158
- epoch: 3.33
- step: 2500

The following hyperparameters were used during training:
